item.title: 周二晚，这位名叫 "Easy on Me "的歌手在她的 Instagram 上分享了一篇帖子，称她因病 "奉医嘱 "不得不推迟几场演出。
item.description:
Adele is taking a break from her Las Vegas residency.

In an Instagram post she shared on Tuesday night, the "Easy on Me" singer said she has to postpone several shows due to illness "on doctors orders." https://t.co/v2VsoSSnkG pic.twitter.com/PTXBh55Ux9

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 汉娜-古铁雷斯（Hannah Gutierrez）非故意过失杀人案的陪审员们看到了《锈迹斑斑》的装甲师在摄影师哈丽娜-哈钦斯（Halyna Hutchins）在西部片拍摄现场遭到致命枪击数小时后接受执法部门询问的镜头。
item.description:
Jurors in the involuntary manslaughter trial of Hannah Gutierrez saw footage of the "Rust" armorer being interviewed by law enforcement hours after cinematographer Halyna Hutchins was fatally shot on the set of the Western.https://t.co/y1CgIlv4eR

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 共和党领导的阿拉巴马州议会周二提出了一项法案，为生育治疗提供保护，从根本上修改了法院的裁决。
item.description:
Nearly 10 days of public outcry spurred movement on Tuesday from the Republican-led Alabama Legislature, where a bill was introduced to carve out protections for fertility treatment and essentially amend the court's ruling.https://t.co/X7VbuqusiY

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 得克萨斯州州长格雷格-阿博特（Greg Abbott）周二宣布，由于 "全州大范围的野火活动"，得克萨斯州有60个县受灾。
item.description:
Texas Gov. Greg Abbott issued a disaster declaration for 60 counties on Tuesday due to "widespread wildfire activity throughout the state."

Officials said wildfires have spread to at least 250,00 acres.https://t.co/M9BflVSgwj pic.twitter.com/FqWD9qpE2U

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 本周二，市监事会一致投票通过一项决议，向黑人居民道歉，并承诺 "纠正和纠正过去的政策和不当行为"，这是一项历史性的举措。
item.description:
In a historic move on Tuesday, the city's Board of Supervisors unanimously voted to adopt a resolution to apologize to Black residents and commit to "the rectification and redress of past policies and misdeeds."https://t.co/7ihOj23drH pic.twitter.com/ufOmR4RHWO

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：在密歇根州，@ABC News 根据投票分析预测，前总统特朗普将赢得共和党初选，总统拜登将赢得民主党初选。
item.description:
BREAKING: In Michigan, @ABC News projects that former Pres. Trump will win the Republican primary and Pres. Biden will win the Democrat primary, based on analysis of the vote. https://t.co/xOhwQ5Gjgf pic.twitter.com/67JPWr7kwn

— ABC News Live (@ABCNewsLive) February 28, 2024

item.title: 美国广播公司新闻（ABC News）根据投票分析预测，唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）将赢得密歇根州共和党初选，乔-拜登（Joe Biden）将赢得该州民主党初选。
item.description:
BREAKING: Donald Trump will win Michigan's Republican primary and Joe Biden will win the state’s Democrat primary, ABC News projects, based on analysis of the vote. https://t.co/shDvmElyeC pic.twitter.com/W2yyw0V3kj

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：@ABC 新闻根据投票分析预测，唐纳德-特朗普将赢得密歇根州共和党初选，乔-拜登将赢得该州民主党初选。

item.title: 得克萨斯州 "毁灭性 "的野火已导致数十个县宣布受灾，并在该州panhandle的部分地区下达了疏散令。
item.description:
"Devastating" wildfires in Texas have prompted a disaster declaration for dozens of counties and evacuation orders in parts of the state's panhandle. https://t.co/28YJSXcLbZ

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 一家 18 世纪英国酒馆在去年一场神秘火灾后被推平，其业主周二接到当地议会的命令，要求重建这家酒馆--而且必须保持原有的倾斜尺寸。
item.description:
The owners of an 18th century British pub, bulldozed after a mysterious fire last year, were ordered Tuesday by a local council to rebuild it — and to stick to its original, lopsided dimensions. https://t.co/K5ULmI2wkW

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 本周二，旧金山监事会的所有 11 名成员投票通过了一项决议，向黑人居民道歉，并承诺 "纠正和纠正过去的政策和不当行为"，这是一项具有历史意义的举动。
item.description:
In a historic move on Tuesday, all 11 members of San Francisco's Board of Supervisors voted to adopt a resolution to apologize to Black residents and commit to "the rectification and redress of past policies and misdeeds." https://t.co/qgnQIqqY2q

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 一名移民和海关执法局（ICE）官员声称，因涉嫌谋杀拉肯-莱利而被捕的委内瑞拉籍嫌犯曾于 2023 年被纽约警察局逮捕并释放，纽约警察局对此进行了反击。
item.description:
The New York Police Department is pushing back after an ICE official claimed the Venezuelan suspect arrested for Laken Riley's murder was previously arrested and released by NYPD in 2023. https://t.co/In4mcs2XVk

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: "这是我见过的最糟糕的情况。"随着加沙人道主义危机的加剧，援助人员被派去帮助那些需要帮助的人。从部署地返回的医务人员接受了 @ABC News 的采访，讲述了他们的所见所闻：
item.description:
"The worst situation I've ever seen."

As the humanitarian crisis in Gaza grows, aid workers have been deployed to help those in need. Medical staff who have returned from deployments spoke with @ABC News
about what they witnessed.

Read more: https://t.co/uMc0Ej3rMN pic.twitter.com/nMjCeKNGCy

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 据当局称，一名加拿大游客在夏威夷的一条偏僻公路上拐错了弯，将租来的汽车开下了 60 英尺高的悬崖，然后摔出车外，被海水冲走，幸好他还活着。
item.description:
A Canadian tourist is lucky to be alive after he apparently took a wrong turn on a remote road in Hawaii and drove his rental car off a 60-foot cliff, before falling out of the vehicle and getting washed out to sea, authorities said. https://t.co/zy8ceSksm1 pic.twitter.com/7qIaHu6NVp

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 加州大学圣塔芭芭拉分校学生会主席称，她是该校多元文化中心未经授权展示的标语的目标，并呼吁校内出现所谓的反犹太主义行为。
item.description:
The student body president at the University of California, Santa Barbara is calling out alleged antisemitism on campus after she says she was targeted in unauthorized signs displayed at the university's multicultural center. https://t.co/TcBNoX03sc

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 玛丽-波平斯》因 "歧视性语言 "在英国获得新的电影分级。
item.description:
'Mary Poppins' gets new film rating in the UK for "discriminatory language." https://t.co/fPnqIjLFu1

item.title: 周二早晨，纽约市被浓雾笼罩，画面令人惊叹。
item.description:
Stunning footage shows New York City covered by a dense fog on Tuesday morning. https://t.co/ydmrGCzjcb pic.twitter.com/lA76qI5ERy

item.title: 众议院监督委员会和司法委员会成员将于周三在国会山举行的闭门会议上采访亨特-拜登。
item.description:
Members of the House Oversight and Judiciary Committees will interview Hunter Biden on Wednesday during a closed-door session on Capitol Hill.https://t.co/1iTXcz3aQP

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 请看：本周二，在气温异常温暖的情况下，强风和干草助长了野火的蔓延，引发了对德克萨斯潘汉德尔地区最北部几个城镇居民的安全警告和至少一项疏散令。
item.description:
SEE IT: Surging wildfires fueled by strong winds and dry grass in unseasonably warm temperatures prompted safety warnings for residents of several towns and at least one evacuation order in the far northern part of the Texas Panhandle on Tuesday.https://t.co/vsporuMhQK pic.twitter.com/atKysQ5Kc6

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 梦想去火星？美国国家航空航天局（NASA）正在地球上为志愿者提供另一个世界的体验，参与者在那里吃、住、交流，就像在 2 亿多英里以外的太空中一样。
item.description:
Dream of going to Mars?

NASA is offering volunteers an otherworldly experience here on Earth, where participants eat, live and communicate as if they were over 200 million miles away in space. https://t.co/OXaSqWJBir pic.twitter.com/H9myrJf8i9

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 日本政府周二公布的数据显示，日本去年的婴儿出生人数降至历史最低水平，高层官员称出生率下降是日本的 "关键 "时刻。
item.description:
The number of babies born in Japan last year fell to the lowest number in the nation's history, government data showed Tuesday, with top officials calling the decline in birth rates a "critical” moment for the nation. https://t.co/wmh6eEzLjt pic.twitter.com/5bS8LCUHIn

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 今年 10 月，佐治亚州一名男子被一名警长开枪打死，被判无罪释放，其家人提起了一项价值 1600 万美元的联邦诉讼，并声称在交火过程中过度使用了武力。
item.description:
The family of an exonerated Georgia man, who was fatally shot by a sheriff's deputy in October, has filed a $16 million federal lawsuit and claimed excessive force was used during the encounter. https://t.co/1NHOtrppaU

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 据当局称，一名重罪犯于周日向押送他的副警长喷辣椒水并偷走她的汽车后逃跑，周二在新奥尔良被抓获。
item.description:
A convicted felon who escaped on Sunday after pepper spraying his transporting deputy and stealing her car was captured in New Orleans Tuesday, authorities said.https://t.co/vTUcpvNKVC

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 据纳什维尔警察局发言人称，曾在 2023 年发生过大规模枪击事件的圣约学校周一收到了炸弹威胁。
item.description:
The Covenant School, which was the site of a 2023 mass shooting, received a bomb threat on Monday, according to a Nashville Police Department spokesperson. https://t.co/5I0rWJZGgw

item.title: 本周二，卫生官员确认了第七例麻疹病例，该病例与佛罗里达一所小学爆发的麻疹疫情有关。
item.description:
The seventh case of measles linked to an outbreak at a Florida elementary school was confirmed by Health officials on Tuesday. https://t.co/cf45GTmO2C

item.title: 在克里姆林宫持续镇压异议人士之际，俄罗斯最著名的人权捍卫者之一因批评乌克兰战争被莫斯科法院判处两年半监禁。
item.description:
One of Russia's best-known human rights defenders was sentenced by a Moscow court to two and a half years in prison for criticizing the war in Ukraine, amid a continuing crackdown by the Kremlin on dissent. https://t.co/xwzd38Ldlt

item.title: 随着新一轮冬季风暴向西海岸袭来，加州内华达山脉将迎来多达 12 英尺的积雪：
item.description:
Up to 12 feet of snow is heading to California's Sierra Nevada mountains as a new winter storm bears down on the West Coast.

See the latest forecast: https://t.co/2hMt4bRWbU

item.title: 最新消息：埃里克-亚当斯（Eric Adams）市长似乎支持修改使纽约成为庇护城市的法律。"如果你犯下重罪或暴力行为，我们应该能够将你移交给移民及海关执法局，并将你驱逐出境，"亚当斯周一说道。
item.description:
JUST IN: Mayor Eric Adams appeared to support a modification of laws that make New York a sanctuary city.

"If you commit a felony, a violent act, we should be able to turn you over to ICE and have you deported," Adams said Monday.https://t.co/GSNvT5UtPh pic.twitter.com/QNDAauvjhq

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：在发生了一系列广为人知的据称由移民犯下的罪行后，埃里克-亚当斯市长似乎支持修改法律，将纽约设为庇护城市。
item.description:
JUST IN: After a series of well-publicized crimes allegedly committed by migrants, Mayor Eric Adams appeared to support a modification of laws that make New York a sanctuary city. https://t.co/LlsJND6P0a

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024
